mutants.original_line: total_score = sum(sentiment_scores.get(word, 0) for word in words)
mutants.mutated_line: total_score = sum((sentiment_scores.get(word, 1) for word in words))

mutants.original_line: total_score = sum(sentiment_scores.get(word, 0) for word in words)
mutants.mutated_line: total_score = sum((sentiment_scores.get(word, -1) for word in words))

mutants.original_line: total_score = sum(sentiment_scores.get(word, 0) for word in words)
mutants.mutated_line: total_score = sum((sentiment_scores.get(word, 1) for word in words))
